Settings.QueryText:
SELECT ALLOWED Outlets.Ref AS Outlet, Outlets.Class, Outlets.Type, TerritoryOutlets.Ref AS Territory, TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner AS Region, Outlets.Distributor AS Distributor FROM Catalog.Outlet AS Outlets LEFT JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Outlets.Ref = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet
GROUP BY Outlets.Ref, Outlets.Class, Outlets.Type, TerritoryOutlets.Ref, TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner, Outlets.Distributor
